settings.title: Coco Part A
settings.description: Intended use: Coco Coir. Provides the perfect ration of nutrients taking into account the cation-exchange capacity of coir.Growing in coco coir has a multitude of benefits and is one of the most popular forms of growing media for good reason. That being said, it takes a precise ratio of nutrients to take full advantage of those benefits: one of those being the right balance of calcium and magnesium. This balance is perfected in Cocos A&B.  Cocos A&B was formulated to provide those who grow in pure coco coir or blends that contain 30% or more coco coir with the perfect ratio of essential nutrients they'll need for healthy growth, with consideration to the unique cation-exchange capacity of the medium.
